meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the August 9, 2024 Retreat, August 13, 2024 Budget Workshop, August 14, 2024 City Council Meeting and August 14, 2024 Special Called Meeting

agenda_items.title: Settlement Authorization
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Jose A. Teniente v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-22-13292 - Not to exceed $30,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Grant Acceptance
agenda_items.description: Authorize the acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services for Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA) for the South Dallas Drug Court Expansion project in the amount of $379,294.00.

agenda_items.title: Cooperative Purchasing Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for web-based managed security system software, hosting, maintenance, and support.

agenda_items.title: Construction Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract to provide construction to demolish existing rooftop units and install new units.
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

agenda_items.title: Real Estate Deliberation
agenda_items.description: Deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property located at 7800 Stemmons.

financial_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit styled Jose A. Teniente v. City of Dallas
Grant from the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services for South Dallas Drug Court Expansion project
Cooperative purchasing agreement for managed security system software
Construction services contract for rooftop units installation
